themes: competition between established artists and organizations for funding
recognition of artists' long-term commitment and financial struggles
distinction between professional artists and hobbyists
value of emerging and established artists to the community
key_phrases: Established Artists should NOT have to compete with cultural organizations for funding
They have proven their committment to art through years of work
Even the most successful artists cannot make a living on their artwork and must teach or take on other work
They should not be eliminated from funding because of their longevity
I would like to see the word Creatives replaced with Artist
Creatives is a catch all word that includes hobbyists
barriers_identified: Established artists competing with organizations for funding
Established artists being eliminated from funding due to longevity
Use of the term 'Creatives' diluting recognition of professional artists
solutions_proposed: Established artists should not have to compete with organizations for funding
Replace the word 'Creatives' with 'Artist' in program language
